metadata.github_note: Organization with forked repos, core bridge may be proprietary

gaps_and_missing_data: Full research pending - initial data only
description: ChainPort is a next-generation security-focused cross-chain bridge that enables users to port tokens across 25+ blockchain ecosystems with fast, permissionless transfers. It is the first bridge that offers a fully security-focused solution safeguarding 95% of funds in cold storage vaults, using active multi-party computation (MPC) with hardware isolation powered by Fireblocks. ChainPort is the only bridge that supports all common bridging methods including wrapped asset bridging (lock-and-mint), native token bridging, hybrid bridging, and external cross-chain protocols like Circle's CCTP for USDC. The platform enables full interoperability, allowing users to port tokens across multiple blockchains without needing to revert back to the original chain.

description.value: ChainPort is a next-generation security-focused cross-chain bridge that enables users to port tokens across 25+ blockchain ecosystems with fast, permissionless transfers. It is the first bridge that offers a fully security-focused solution safeguarding 95% of funds in cold storage vaults, using active multi-party computation (MPC) with hardware isolation powered by Fireblocks. ChainPort is the only bridge that supports all common bridging methods including wrapped asset bridging (lock-and-mint), native token bridging, hybrid bridging, and external cross-chain protocols like Circle's CCTP for USDC. The platform enables full interoperability, allowing users to port tokens across multiple blockchains without needing to revert back to the original chain.

multi_party_computation.description: Active MPC with hardware isolation for multi-layer security
multi_party_computation.implementation: Private key sharding with encrypted shares distributed among multiple parties

hardware_isolation.description: Hardware-based security isolation combined with MPC cryptography
hardware_isolation.purpose: Protection against cyber attacks, internal collusion, and human error

cold_storage.description: Multi-signature cold storage with fund segregation

private_bridge_service.description: Enhanced privacy bridge with 3-of-5 multi-sig wallets
private_bridge_service.key_distribution: 2 keys held by ChainPort, 2 by token issuer, 1 optional trustee key

encryption.description: Fireblocks MPC encryption for key management

proof_of_reserves.description: Transparency mechanism for verifying locked assets

notes.tee_support: No evidence found for Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) implementation
notes.zero_knowledge_proofs: No specific implementation details found for zero-knowledge proofs
